S.FORM: cait siwkay nu cait cait sa, pasiketen ku tuutuud i pabaw.tinaku , micait ku hata i culay, sibali sa mabahel tu ku hata. pacaiten ku hata i cabeng. tinaku a kamu pacait i cabengen pacait ku tupel. pacaiten pacaiten kiya zikuc! picaitan mipacek tu picaitan i cabeng ci Dungi. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika ( :Suspension bondage) . . Suspension bondage is a form of sexual bondage where a bound person is hung from one or more overhead suspension points. Suspension bondage is considered to carry a higher risk than other forms of sexual bondage. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
